input_args.messages: [{'role': 'system', 'content': 'choose an appropriate tool to use to answer the following thought based on the following tools:\nadd:None'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'What is 5 plus 3?'}]
input_args.response_schema: {'$defs': {'exception_raiserInput': {'additionalProperties': False, 'properties': {'a': {'description': 'Parameter a', 'title': 'A', 'type': 'integer'}, 'b': {'description': 'Parameter b', 'title': 'B', 'type': 'integer'}, 'tool_name': {'const': 'add', 'description': 'The name of the function to call', 'title': 'Tool Name', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['a', 'b', 'tool_name'], 'title': 'exception_raiserInput', 'type': 'object'}}, 'properties': {'tool_input': {'discriminator': {'mapping': {'add': '#/$defs/exception_raiserInput'}, 'propertyName': 'tool_name'}, 'oneOf': [{'$ref': '#/$defs/exception_raiserInput'}], 'title': 'Tool Input'}}, 'required': ['tool_input'], 'title': 'ToolsInput', 'type': 'object'}
